column4: I want to setup some vhosts for apache. Now I wonder where to put the documentroot. /var/www already is a document root for default.
there is no directory sites-available in /var
that is the config dir, I already found it. I was asking, where to put the documentroot.
That tells me, that the document root for the default site is /var/www. What I want to know is, where to put the document root for new vhosts. Is there a recommended place?
There is a difference between a config file and where the html-files finally go: the latter one is the document root.
ican√∏t understand what you want actually
the documentroot for default is /var/www. What would be the documentroot for a new vhost which has its own documentroot?
/var/www/mysites will be in the document root of default, so this cannot be the solution.
point docoroot to any folder you want
OK, there is no recommended place. Since the config files had a sophisticated layout, I expected the same for where to put document root.
vhost can create 100000 vhost, just point the docroot to the directory you want, for example mysite is desian.dk pointed to my /home/sia/desian.public/
